entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
